animals.name: Turtle
animals.funFact: Turtles have been around for over 200 million years.

animals.name: Crocodile
animals.funFact: Crocodiles are the world's largest and longest reptile.

animals.name: Chameleon
animals.funFact: Chameleons are famous for their ability to change their color.

animals.name: Iguana
animals.funFact: Iguanas have a 'third eye', a photosensitive organ that detects light changes.

animals.name: Snake
animals.funFact: Snakes have flexible jaws which allow them to eat prey bigger than their head.
